transportAdvice: Calgary has a light rail transit system (LRT) and an extensive bus network that connects major tourist areas, including downtown and popular attractions. Taxis and ride-hailing services are widely available, and the downtown core is walkable, though a car is helpful for reaching attractions outside the city.

weather.description: Bitterly cold with frequent snowfall, though sunny chinook winds can bring brief warm spells.
Still cold and wintry but chinooks can temporarily push temperatures above freezing.
Early signs of spring with variable temperatures and occasional snow still possible.
Mild and increasingly pleasant, though late snowstorms are not uncommon.
Warm and green with longer days, though afternoon showers are fairly common.
Warm summer weather begins with occasional thunderstorms in the afternoons.
The warmest month of the year, coinciding with the Calgary Stampede and plenty of sunshine.
Warm and sunny with similar conditions to July, ideal for outdoor activities.
Crisp and pleasant early autumn weather with cooling temperatures and clear skies.
Noticeably cooler with early frosts possible and the first light snowfalls of the season.
Cold and grey with regular snowfall and short daylight hours.
Full winter conditions with cold temperatures, snow, and occasional chinook relief.
